name: Properly Lost in Space
description:
Cedric and Cecil are two unreliable astronauts who are out and about in space. Guide their space ship to Mars to pick up Cecil's old map before returning home before its closing time at their local pub.  Be careful though, don't use up all your fuel when in space or fly out of Mars atmosphere when you get to the red planet! Otherwise you will be Properly lost in Space!

Controls:

WASD keys. 

Press W key to initiate take off in space. Press S key to use thrusters on Mars.
